page.title: 08My Modern House by Faye
page.content: My house in Halling is a modern house built in 1982.It is mostly grey and white in colour.The grey part is the roof.It has four bedrooms,a bathroom with a toilet,a shower-room with a toilet and a single toilet down stairs.We also have a utility room, a kitchen,a dining-room and a living- room.The loft entry is in my sister's bed-room and inside the loft is a great big empty space. My garden is also huge.The flowers are beginning to grow in it.We have a nice big garage so we can store things.There is also storage-room under the cupboards in the kitchen.The lounge is quite big and there are beams nearly every-where. There are new houses being built in Halling and some families have already moved into Britannia Close,a new development on the High Street.
